programme.title: 100 Women
programme.sub-title: Raid at the Brothel Next Door
programme.desc: It all starts with a friendly voice that offers vulnerable women an opportunity when they need it the most - until the pin drops, and they realise their lives will never be the same. In Spain, both a destination and a transit country for victims trafficked for sex into Europe mostly from Latin America and Africa, an elite group of women investigators are fighting international gangs to liberate women from the sinister trap they are caught in. BBC 100 Women followed them as they engage in round-the-clock surveillance operations and raids, with unprecedented access into the heart of a global crime that is often hidden just in the flat next door.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: A decade after they joined forces, survivors Tallahassee, Columbus, Wichita and Little Rock have become experts in identifying and disposing assorted zombies. They set up their new home in the abandoned White House, but after Little Rock heads to Graceland, the team attempts to save her from a group of super zombies. Director Ruben Fleischer's comedy horror sequel, starring Woody Harrelson, Jesse Eisenberg and Emma Stone

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels across the United States in search of restaurants in dire need of renovation - and after analysing their situation, he has just 24 hours to bring them back from the brink of disaster. This time, Gordon and the team revamp a Cuban-inspired restaurant in Toms River, New Jersey, owned by Patty and her business partner Jeremey, who has already invested $2,000,000 into the restaurant

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Bellstar Hotels and Resorts has been developing Canadian boutique hotel properties since 2004, and manages a dozen resorts across Alberta and British Columbia, but President and CEO Ed Romanowski wants the company to grow into new markets to attract more customers to the seasonal industry. He disguises himself as a member of the housekeeping team at one of the resorts to learn about the organisation at grassroots level

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: Everyone pulls together to create magical memories for Mercedes and the McQueens to cherish, while a Christmas card reveals a connection between two residents and an unlocked door might unveil an affair. Freddie is being pulled in all directions, while Robbie frets about his future with Vicky and one villager wants to move their relationship forward but gets a frosty reaction

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer breaks his jaw in an accident and has to have it wired shut. Unable to speak, he discovers the benefits of listening - but Marge finds it hard to come to terms with his uncharacteristic silence

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Doug and Carrie decide to renew their wedding vows, but preparations for the ceremony throw up more challenges than anticipated - not least the task of finding a chimp to act as best man

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Deacon's estranged wife tells Carrie she wants to get back with him. Doug isn't sure whether to reveal this new development to his friend - especially as he's just announced he's going away for the weekend with another woman

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles takes a new position as a magazine art critic, prompting a jealous Frasier to respond by launching his own arts show. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Dog That Rocks the Cradle Season 7, Episode 5
programme.desc: Martin returns from a friend's funeral upset by how it was conducted, and begins to plan his own memorial. Meanwhile, sacked DJ Bulldog takes the opportunity to embark on an entirely new career - in pizza delivery. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles and Frasier fall out, each convinced the other is secretly coveting his date. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: A Tsar Is Born Season 7, Episode 7
programme.desc: Niles and Frasier are excited to learn they may be descended from Russian royalty, and Martin appears on the Antiques Roadshow. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Girl's in the Band Season 30, Episode 19
programme.desc: Lisa's music teacher is horrified when Lisa is poached by the director of the Capitol City Philharmonic for his youth orchestra, but Homer and Marge struggle with funding her

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Clown Stays in the Picture Season 30, Episode 14
programme.desc: Krusty reveals the story of his past in a movie, while Bart and Lisa work as his personal assistants on the film and learn about the early years of their parents' relationship

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer are joined by guests Joe Lycett, Melanie Hill, Dr Chris van Tulleken, and Pepsi & Shirlie. With music from Majestic and Barbara Tucker

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: I'm Just a Girl Who Can't Say D'oh Season 30, Episode 20
programme.desc: Marge puts on a play written by Lisa when she gets a big job at the theatre, while Homer develops a crush on Maggie's baby class supervisor

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The family goes on holiday to Niagara Falls, where a mix-up sees Lisa mistakenly granted asylum in Canada and Marge has to come to her daughter's rescue

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: A workaholic father tries to make up for his perpetual absence from home by promising to buy his son a hugely popular action figure for Christmas - little realising every other father in town has the same idea. Comedy, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Sinbad, Jake Lloyd, Rita Wilson, Robert Conrad and Phil Hartman

programme.title: Christmas at Liberty
programme.desc: Documentary following the famous London department store's preparations for Christmas. This festive season is particularly important, in light of the blow to profits caused by the closure during 2020, but setting up the decorations coincides with their most ambitious building restoration ever, their first in 100 years. The programme also follows the team behind Liberty's new range of candles, which have been designed and manufactured during lockdown

programme.title: The Piano
programme.desc: Claudia Winkleman hosts a Christmas special at London's Kings Cross station with Mika and Lang Lang. As the travelling crowds gather around the public piano, this unique episode catches up with pianists from the first series, who play their favourite Christmas songs. There are some celebrity surprises, secret Santa moments, a performance accompanied by Gregory Porter, and a finale led by Mika and Lang Lang

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: With sport and weather

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: A climatologist warns global warming will soon result in destructive freak weather, or even another ice age. He thinks the world still has time to prepare for the worst, but the crisis happens almost immediately - and as storms, earthquakes and hurricanes strike in terrifying fashion, he races across America to rescue his son from a frozen New York. Disaster thriller, with Jake Gyllenhaal and Dennis Quaid

programme.title: Jamie Cooks Christmas
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jamie invites his family to join him in his outdoor kitchen shed and makes smoked trout p√¢t√©, served with red cabbage slaw and a giant Yorkshire pudding for sharing. He gives the traditional turkey a run for its money with festive porchetta, crispy root veg and roast potatoes, and also takes a Christmas staple to new heights in his vegetarian main, a chestnut and Brussels sprouts pie

programme.title: John Lewis at Christmas
programme.desc: Following staff at John Lewis as they prepare for the festive season. Including a behind-the-scenes look at the planning and creation of the famous Christmas advert and insight into the jobs of the buyers who travel all over the world to gauge the national mood and source over 1,500 decorations and edible treats to sell. Plus, the in-store staff create Santa's grottos and decorate the shop floor to create the ultimate customer experience

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics appraise shows including You Bet!, Black Doves, Jamie Cooks Christmas, Wolf Hall: The Mirror and the Light, The 1% Club and A Nonsense Christmas with Sabrina Carpenter

programme.title: White House Down
programme.desc: A policeman is turned down for his dream job as a secret service bodyguard to the president. While taking his daughter on a tour of the White House, he gets the chance to prove himself when terrorists seize control of the building, putting the head of state's life in his hands. Action thriller, starring Channing Tatum, Jamie Foxx, Maggie Gyllenhaal and James Woods

programme.title: Ramsay's 24 Hours to Hell and Back
programme.sub-title: Botto's Italian Line Restaurant Season 3, Episode 4
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay travels across the United States in search of restaurants in dire need of renovation - and after analysing their situation, he has just 24 hours to bring them back from the brink of disaster. This time, Gordon visits Botto's in Swedesboro, New Jersey. It's a family-owned business which Gordon thinks has an interior more like a funeral parlour, so he and the team roll their sleeves up and give it a renovation and a new menu

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stuart Suls, the CEO of oil-change firm Mr Lube, goes undercover as a technician to meet the employees at grassroots level and find out how developments in the motor industry are affecting the business and how customer service can be improved as the company expands

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Back in 2011, Edward and Hazel Short set out to build an art deco, shining white lighthouse tower with additional bedrooms, guest rooms and infinity pool, all on a rugged but beautiful clifftop in north Devon. It was an ambitious project and quickly ran into trouble, not least the apparent breakdown of the couple's marriage and a spiral of borrowing and debt which, by the end of 2019, left Edward facing bankruptcy. Kevin McCloud now returns to see if anything has been salvaged from this disastrous project

programme.title: Sunday Brunch
programme.desc: Tim Lovejoy and Simon Rimmer present highlights from Sunday Brunch. They chat to actor and comedian Jason Sudeikis

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Seattle shrink is delighted when a station in another city begins relaying his radio show - until he struggles to compete with the popularity of the host he has replaced. Elsewhere, Niles, Daphne and Martin's attempt to build a table does not go according to plan

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Daphne's birthday party sparks a series of unexpected events, and after a night of intimacy, Frasier pursues Roz to her family reunion in Wisconsin, where he pretends to be her estranged partner Roger. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and Peri Gilpin

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles persuades Daphne's hard-drinking father to call on her mother in Seattle, hoping he can inspire them to start afresh. Meanwhile, Frasier and Roz reflect on their night together. Comedy, guest starring Brian Cox

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Kill Gil, Volumes I & II Season 18, Episode 8
programme.desc: Department store Santa Gil grants Lisa's Christmas wish, but loses his job as a result. Feeling guilty, the family offers him a bed for the night - but he promptly moves in, along with all of his belongings. As the uninvited lodger becomes a pest, Marge looks for ways to get rid of him

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host the long-running words-and-numbers game with Rory Bremner joining Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: The gang declares war on the staff of rival bar Gary's Old Town Tavern, who have taken the liberty of stealing a prized trophy from Cheers. Ted Danson and George Wendt star

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam and Woody argue over who can kiss Rebecca for three seconds. American bar-room comedy, starring Ted Danson and Woody Harrelson

programme.title: Cheers
programme.sub-title: Backseat Becky, Up Front Season 6, Episode 25
programme.desc: A desperate Rebecca goes to extraordinary lengths to get a moment alone with Evan Drake as he prepares to move to Japan. Comedy, starring Kirstie Alley and Tom Skerritt

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Danny does some gardening work for Carrie's gynaecologist - but she thinks the doctor might refuse to see her as a patient when she learns how much her friend overcharged him. Guest starring Judge Reinhold

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie hears her law firm is laying people off and begins to worry about her job, while Doug lands himself in the doghouse by losing Deacon's lucky ball. American comedy, starring Kevin James, Leah Remini and Victor Williams

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie cooks Thanksgiving dinner for 10 people, while Doug takes pity on a stranger who has been left waiting for a lift - but his good intentions backfire. With Leah Remini and Kevin James

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: The Late Doctor Crane Season 7, Episode 8
programme.desc: Niles tries to settle a score with a plastic surgeon, only to find himself attracted to her, while Frasier is disappointed by the lack of achievements listed in his obituary when it is published prematurely

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Frederick does his best to get Frasier and Lilith back together during a Thanksgiving visit. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Bebe Neuwirth and Trevor Einhorn

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Part one of two. A bout of crippling back pain prompts Frasier to begin taking strong medication - which dulls his senses and causes him to accidentally blurt out a long-held secret to Daphne. Comedy, with Kelsey Grammer and Jane Leeves

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Cranes take a trip in the Winnebago on New Year's Eve to celebrate the turn of the new millennium, but a case of mistaken identity leaves Frasier and Martin trying to rescue Niles from another family's van

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Midday news summary

programme.title: Christmas in Rome
programme.desc: An American tour guide in Rome agrees to teach a culture-shocked businessman about the Italian capital during the festive period. Romantic drama, starring Lacey Chabert and Sam Page, with Franco Nero

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Christmas
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver shares more festive recipes, including a salmon gravadlax starter for a modern twist on the traditional Christmas dinner. The chef also shares alternative ways to prepare turkey, roast potatoes and Brussel sprouts to shake things up on the big day, as well as a new take on national favourite the Yorkshire pudding

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray and Rachel Riley host as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against words and numbers. Christopher Biggins is in Dictionary Corner with Susie Dent

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton helps carpenter Bob and sports massage therapist Vida, who've been together for 20 years. The west coast of the Peloponnese region in Greece is a very special place for Bob, who's visited the area for 40 years. The couple want to buy a holiday home that one day could become their permanent home. Laura shows them five options for their ¬£300,000 budget

programme.title: Chateau DIY

programme.desc: A mother-of-three is in resus after a severe asthma attack. As she is treated, the programme reveals how she has coped with life as a teenage mother with serious health problems. programme.title: 24 Hours in A&E
programme.desc: Hospital staff at Queen's Medical Centre in Nottingham treat three female university students who have been victims of a spate of needle-spiking attacks. Twenty year-old Kate is rushed in after collapsing in a nightclub and having to receive CPR from a friend when she stopped breathing normally. In the Urgent Treatment Unit 19 year-old Pavni and 21-year-old Sarah meet while waiting for treatment after what they suspect to be needle-spiking. While being treated Pavni talks about the racist abuse she faced growing up and Sarah reveals the impact COVID-19 has had on her university experience

programme.title: Tsunami 2004: The Day the Wave Hit
programme.desc: Part one of two. A minute-by-minute account of the December 2004 tsunami, which destroyed towns and villages across the Indian Ocean, killing 230,000. Among those sharing their personal experiences of the disaster are a hotelier who was recently married and three months pregnant at the time, and a man travelling by train who was forced to climb on top of the carriage to escape

programme.title: Tsunami 2004: The Day the Wave Hit
programme.desc: Part two of two. Holidaymakers share their experiences of the disaster, including a woman who was separated from her family on the beach, witnessing the death of her son, a couple whose bungalow was destroyed, and a family that fled to higher ground when their hotel was destroyed

programme.desc: Emma Willis and Matt Willis join forces with The Stanway School in Colchester as they challenge a group of Year 8 pupils, and themselves, to give up their smartphones completely for 21 days. As parents, Matt and Emma have become increasingly concerned about the impact smartphones are having on their kids and are keen to find out if excessive smartphone use is affecting children's mental and physical health. This experiment, conducted in conjunction with The University of York, will see the pupils undergo a series of tests with experts, meticulously monitoring their behavioural changes over the 21 days, repeating the tests at the end of the three weeks to assess what effects giving up phones really has on the brain - including sleep and attention. Will locking away the devices make the kids happier, healthier and more ready to learn? And will this experiment prove that smartphones should be banned until at least the age of 14?

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Northamptonshire's roads and firearms teams join forces to stop a driver making a 130mph getaway in a high-performance Mercedes, while Operation Revive is on a mission to clear up the county's wanted list. programme.title: Casualty 24/7: Every Second Counts
programme.desc: A 21-year-old is rushed in with signs of sepsis and Dr Alice Duffy and the team need to act fast to find out where the infection is coming from., while Dr Chris Yeoman tends to a schoolboy who has had a stone lodged in his ear for the past three days. Dr Alex Webster assesses an 89-year-old with a complex medical history who keeps collapsing

programme.title: Motorway Cops: Catching Britain's Speeders
programme.desc: Sgt Dave Roberts races to the scene when a child is knocked off his bike by a car outside a school in Gateshead, but the wait time for an ambulance is three hours. programme.title: Cause of Death
programme.desc: Lancashire Senior Coroner Dr Adeley investigates the sudden death of a 52-year-old mum, who may have died due to an inherited condition. Upon receiving news of Irene Wright's death, a past member of the team, her former colleagues attempt to discover what caused her death

programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: Hidden stories of the famous London toy store, from its links to the royals to the vital role its owners played in the Second World War, and from battling bankruptcy to bringing in five million visitors every year. The programme reveals why traditional teddy bears still remain a favourite, and why magic played an important role in the store hundreds of years before Harry Potter came along. Former staff uncover the secrets of the shop floor, including how toy demonstrators try to capture the imagination and encourage people to part with their cash

programme.title: 5 News Update
programme.desc: The latest reports

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: Despite its delayed arrival, for the grey seals at Ravenscar beach winter means it is time to give birth. The newborn pups are now on the fast track to adulthood, with just three weeks to gain as much weight as possible before their mothers move on. Cameras also follow the progress of many short-eared owls that land on the moors after the long flight over the North Sea from northern Europe

programme.title: 5 News Update
programme.desc: The latest reports

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: A Donkey for Christmas Season 1, Episode 1
programme.desc: Peter Wright teams up with Dame Judi Dench to travel to The Flicka Foundation Donkey Sanctuary in Cornwall, where Dame Judi became a patron after visiting in 2022 and falling in love with the donkeys. She's joined by her daughter Finty Williams. Peter then travels the country and meets the unsung heroes of the donkey welfare world, from County Durham to Cornwall

programme.title: Christmas on the Farm 2024
programme.desc: Helen Skelton, JB Gill and Jules Hudson celebrate the magic of the season at Cannon Hall Farm in South Yorkshire with some special guests, including familiar faces from The Yorkshire Vet. There's excitement of new life on the farm as baby animals are born amid the winter chill. Plus, Jules Hudson lends a hand to some real-life Santas who are carving some festive items for Christmas

programme.title: 999: Critical Condition
programme.desc: Trauma team leader Julie Norton battles to save two patients whose lives hang in the balance. Father of four Ian is rushed in after suffering a cardiac arrest, while another man is bleeding so heavily he risks losing his entire circulatory system. Meanwhile, Ken has fallen from a roof onto a skip, leaving him with a gaping wound to his thigh and potentially life-threatening injuries to his pelvis and spine, and Dr Nayak helps Michael, who has suffered a severe stroke

programme.title: A&E After Dark
programme.desc: Documentary going behind the scenes at Hull Royal Infirmary to show the night-time challenges facing NHS staff working in the A&E department. A 34-year-old man is brought in after having punched his arm through a pub window. Handcuffed and accompanied by four police officers, his behaviour has medical staff fearing for the wellbeing of other patients. Matron Kat Henry deals with a flirtatious patient who has cut his head after a night out on the town and is determined to leave the hospital without treatment

programme.title: London Has Fallen
programme.desc: World leaders gather in London for the funeral of the British Prime Minister, unaware they have been led into a trap. A terrorist plans to kill them all, and devastate the city, and the only people in a position to stop him are the President of the United States and the indomitable head of his secret service. Action thriller sequel to Olympus Has Fallen, starring Gerard Butler, Aaron Eckhart and Morgan Freeman

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent a precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: A reporter's purchase of a model ship brings him under threat from a ruthless criminal, as it is one of a series of clues to the location of the real vessel, which holds a pirate's lost treasure. He sets off on a globetrotting quest to find it, assisted by a drunken sea captain, two bumbling detectives and his faithful dog. Steven Spielberg's animated adventure based on Herge's comic-strip series, with the voices of Jamie Bell, Andy Serkis and Daniel Craig

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough

programme.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: When a powerful experimental weapon is snatched by a mysterious terrorist organisation, two of the soldiers guarding it are recruited into a top-secret military strike force. As they go in search of the stolen technology, they uncover a plot by its creator to take over the world. Action adventure, with Channing Tatum, Sienna Miller and Christopher Eccleston

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends
programme.desc: A music executive heads out to a Cornish fishing village on a mission to recruit a group of 10 local fishermen into recording an album of sea shanties. He struggles to win over the unlikely boy band and their families, but begins to gain a new appreciation for their traditional values. Comedy, starring James Purefoy, Daniel Mays and Tuppence Middleton

programme.title: Black and Blue
programme.desc: A rookie cop finds herself targeted by corrupt police and gangsters when she witnesses a drug dealer's murder. She teams up with the one person from her community who is willing to help her, as she tries to escape both the criminals out for revenge and the police who are desperate to destroy the incriminating evidence. Crime drama, starring Naomie Harris, Tyrese Gibson and Frank Grillo

programme.title: The Outsiders
programme.desc: A teenager from the wrong side of the tracks leads a high-school gang in a revenge battle with the city's rich kids who caused the death of a friend. Francis Ford Coppola's drama, with Matt Dillon, C Thomas Howell, Tom Cruise, Patrick Swayze, Ralph Macchio, Emilio Estevez and Rob Lowe

programme.title: The Man from Colorado
programme.desc: An American Civil War veteran, twisted by his experiences during the conflict, becomes the judge of a small town. He embarks on a reign of terror, ruthlessly misusing his power, and it falls to an old friend from his army days to bring him down. Western, starring Glenn Ford, William Holden, Ellen Drew and Ray Collins

programme.title: Anne of the Indies
programme.desc: A no-nonsense pirate welcomes a French captain on board her ship and promptly falls in love - unaware the charming officer has been sent by the British to capture her. Learning of the deception, she kidnaps his wife to sell as a slave. Jacques Tourneur's high-seas adventure, starring Jean Peters, Louis Jourdan, Debra Paget and Herbert Marshall

programme.title: Dr Who and the Daleks
programme.desc: The eccentric time-traveller journeys to the Daleks' home world, which has been devastated by their nuclear weapons. He enters their city and finds them engaged in a plot to exterminate their peaceful humanoid enemies the Thals. Sci-fi adventure based on the TV series, starring Peter Cushing, Roy Castle, Jennie Linden and Roberta Tovey

programme.title: Goodbye Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Biopic of children's author AA Milne, focusing on how his relationship with his son influenced the creation of the Winnie the Pooh stories. The books prove immensely popular in a nation recovering from the trauma of the First World War, but bring the youngster who inspired them uncomfortably into the public eye. Starring Domhnall Gleeson, Margot Robbie and Kelly Macdonald

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Four sisters are raised by their strong-willed mother while their father is away fighting in the American Civil War. Although one yearns to become a writer and another dreams of being married, the girls remain firmly united as the family steers a course through hard times and tragic events. Period drama, based on Louisa May Alcott's novel, with Winona Ryder, Susan Sarandon, Claire Danes, Samantha Mathis and Kirsten Dunst

programme.title: The Northman Interview Special
programme.desc: Alexander Skarsgard, Anya Taylor-Joy and director Robert Eggers talk about making their Viking adventure

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: A man who finds himself troubled by memories that are not his and developing skills he never learned is recruited by a mysterious organisation. The members of this group have learned to access the experiences of their past lives, but one has gone rogue, and must be stopped in his efforts to end the cycle of reincarnation by destroying all human life. Sci-fi thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg and Chiwetel Ejiofor

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: An insurance investigator suffers from short-term memory loss after an attack in which his wife was also raped and murdered. Unable to remember events for more than a few minutes, he is determined to track down the killer and relies on copious note-taking and reminders tattooed on his body to aid his mission. Christopher Nolan's thriller, starring Guy Pearce, Carrie-Anne Moss, Joe Pantoliano and Mark Boone Jr

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: Cynical, hard-drinking teacher Elizabeth Halsey hates her job and the kids in her class, and hopes to escape her daily grind by landing a rich husband. A wealthy substitute seems like a suitable candidate, but she has a rival for his attention in a squeaky-clean colleague. Comedy, starring Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Jason Segel and Lucy Punch

programme.title: Gift Horse
programme.desc: A Navy captain reluctantly takes command of an old US destroyer during the Second World War and struggles with a crew who do not respect his authority. However, the prospect of facing the mighty German force brings much-needed unity. Adventure, starring Trevor Howard, Richard Attenborough, Bernard Lee, Sonny Tufts and James Donald

programme.title: Sink the Bismarck!
programme.desc: Fact-based Second World War drama, charting the mission to track down and eliminate the pride of the German fleet, a fearsome battleship devastating British vessels in the North Atlantic, orchestrated by a British naval officer recovering from his wife's death in an air raid. Starring Kenneth More, Dana Wynter, Laurence Naismith and Karel Stepanek

programme.title: The Mask of Zorro
programme.desc: The sword-wielding saviour of Spanish California returns after 20 years in prison, tutoring a thief to take over his heroic role and tackle corrupt government officials, who are using slave labour to mine gold illegally. Both mentor and pupil have personal scores to settle with their enemies, led by a ruthless governor and a psychotic military officer. Swashbuckling adventure, with Anthony Hopkins, Antonio Banderas and Catherine Zeta-Jones.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: The shape-changing robots are driven into hiding when the human race turns against them. When rediscovered by a kindly inventor and his daughter, they come out of exile to save the world, battling a new breed of human-created Transformers. These deadly new machines were created to hunt them down, but are now growing independent and intend to make use of technology from the Transformers' home planet in a plot that could threaten all life on Earth. Fourth film in the sci-fi adventure series, starring Mark Wahlberg, Stanley Tucci and Kelsey Grammer

programme.title: The Northman
programme.desc: Prince Amleth, the son of the murdered Viking King Aurvandill War-Raven, heads to cold, windswept Iceland to retrieve what was stolen from him - a father, a mother, and a kingdom. Amleth embarks on a murderous quest to find the hateful adversary, whose life is for ever woven together with his by the hands of fate. Historical adventure, starring Alexander Skarsgard, Nicole Kidman, Claes Bang and Ethan Hawke

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: When veteran hunter Cory Lambert discovers a young women's frozen body in Wyoming Native American reservation, he gains help from an inexperienced FBI agent to investigate the suspicious murder. Taylor Sheridan's crime drama, starring Jeremy Renner and Elizabeth Olsen

programme.title: American Dad!
programme.desc: Steve is upset that he does not have a big brother to look up to and finds a friend in Jeff, but the two soon become involved in a huge scam

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to discover how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers, before discovering who has won the competition. programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Five cooks from in and around Harrogate, North Yorkshire, battle to win the ¬£1,000 prize in the culinary contest. First to take on hosting duties is farm girl Jane Steele, who hopes a combination of innovative recipes and fancy wine will win over her guests - horse enthusiast Cassy Bell, photographer Simon Meyer, country gent Alasdair Moore and adventurous punk and cupcake seller Cathy McConaghy

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Horse enthusiast Cassy Bell hosts the second dinner party in Harrogate, North Yorkshire, hoping her jockey-themed evening and gastro-pub menu will be enough to win her the ¬£1,000 prize

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Cathy McConaghy hosts the third dinner party in Harrogate, North Yorkshire, where she decides to return to her Irish roots and serve a menu of home-made soda bread, cockle soup, oysters, roast lamb, and stout-infused sticky toffee pudding as she vies for the ¬£1,000 prize. However, not all of her guests are impressed with the choice of food being dished up

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Photographer Simon Meyer is the fourth dinner-party host in Harrogate, North Yorkshire. He takes a laid-back approach to the task, but his chicken soup starter goes down so well the guests' comments leave him struggling to retain his composure

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Country gent Alasdair Moore hosts the final dinner party in Harrogate, and hopes to impress his guests with his specially selected wines and 'proper' menu. While his monkfish is well received, an early slip-up dents his confidence, and a risky parlour game does not endear him to farm lady Jane Steele. As the evening progresses, his competitors rate their experience, before the winner of the ¬£1,000 cash prize is announced

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: The East Anglian Air Ambulance crew fight to save their patient's partially amputated hand in Stowmarket and a crew in High Wycombe to help a man in cardiac arrest. programme.title: The Emergency Ward
programme.desc: A critically injured patient is flown in after his horse threw him from the saddle, and a 21-year-old motorcyclist has crashed into a car

programme.title: Inside the Bomb Squad
programme.desc: Documentary following the work of the British Army soldiers who defuse bombs in the UK, providing an insight into the training they receive at 'Bomb School' in Bicester. Sergeant Alex 'Swansea' Hughes is called out at night to a woodland near Clitheroe, where a dog walker has found an explosive dating back to the Second World War. Swansea must make it safe by taking it to a large open field and blowing it up. Sergeant Sam Jones - a veteran of Afghanistan - has seen a spike in the number of calls the bomb squad receive in the UK due to the craze of magnet fishing. Treasure hunters hurl large industrial weights into lakes and canals but often get more than they bargained for, pulling out all manner of potentially deadly explosives including mortar bombs and hand grenades, with one man causing a major incident by disposing of a grenade in a dustbin on the industrial estate where he works

programme.title: Inside the Bomb Squad
programme.desc: Sergeant David 'Podders' Podmore is called out to investigate after a shooting in the Liverpool area, and following a raid at a property, a number of weapons are seized, including a potential improvised explosive device made out of industrial fireworks. Meanwhile, Sam Jones and Matt Coogan head to the scene of a mortar bomb discovery, while Sergeant Alex 'Swansea' Hughes is called to Llandudno, where a magnet fisherman has taken a mortar that he's found to work

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: Max McMurdo and Henry Cole visit a motorbike fan, making table lamps from engines and turning a pallet and iron wheels into a stylish modern coffee table

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend take on one of their most obscure cars to date - a little-known Cannon trials competition car. Car trialling is the world's second oldest motorsport, taking specially adapted cars up steep slippery hills and through thick mud courses. It was huge in the 1950s and '60s, but less well known today

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend travel to Devon to fix up one of the fastest road cars of its time, a 1997 Mitsubishi Evo 4. The car that Tim and Fuzz are taking on belongs to 60-year-old Gary, a petrolhead who loved his Evo and used it as his daily driver
